course_name: Transnational Crime and International Criminal Justice
description: This course involves studying international responses to crimes that are global in nature. It will look at how the law and international agencies respond to such crimes as organised crime, people trafficking, cyber crime, terrorism, corporate crime and crimes against humanity. The adequacy and effectiveness of responses to transnational and global crime will be assessed.
restricted: Restricted to students enrolled in the Bachelor of Criminology and Criminal Justice (Honours)
